edu.iu.harp.client

Class DataMSTBcastSender

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.iu.harp.client.Sender
      • edu.iu.harp.client.DataSender
        • edu.iu.harp.client.DataMSTBcastSender

  • public class DataMSTBcastSender
extends DataSender
    The actual sender for broadcasting the data using MST method We don't allow the worker broadcasts to itself.
